greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array of binomial transforms of Fibonacci numbers, read by antidiagonals.
comment: Rows include A000045, A001519, A081567, A081568, A081569, A081570, A081571 Rows are solutions of the recurrence a(n)=(2k+1)a(n-1)-A028387(k-1)a(n-2), a(0)=1,a(1)=k+1.
formula: Rows are successive binomial transforms of F(n+1). T(n, k)=(1/2-sqrt(5)/10)((2k+1)/2-sqrt(5)/2)^n+(1/2+sqrt(5)/10)(sqrt(5)/2+(2k+1)/2)^n
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Mar 22 2003
